name: The Runaway Princess
description:
Princess Marcelle was framed for the murder of her twin. She was denounced for attempting to rid herself of competition to the throne. Despite her grief, Marcelle wants to protect her kingdom from the being responsible for this chaos. Help Marcelle fine teammates to join her on the journey to prove her innocence!

use space to jump

a key to move left

d key to move right

and hold space to float
